snippet: Upon further review, Ian Desmond’s inside-the-park homer was changed to a ground-rule double, and that helped Atlanta pull out a 2-1 win over the Nationals.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat Washington Nationals, 2-1, after benefiting from decision that overturns inside-the-park home run; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Upon further review, Ian Desmond’s inside-the-park homer was changed to a ground-rule double, and that helped Atlanta pull out a 2-1 win over the Nationals.
